description:
Kurokan tells Sakamoto about the accident happened to his parents. Kurokan wants Sakamoto to go to the hospital immediately!
Hitomi comes to help right after receiving Kurokan`s call. The team is really down after knowing Sakamoto`s absence.
Kurokan sends Kojika to replace Sakamoto. Kojika is standing on the pitching mound and trembling with fear when the fans realize that the pitcher isn`t Sakamoto and start to shout and begin to make noise.
Kurokan switches the players to the freshmen gradually who doesn`t have emotional burden and play exceptionally well. 
Eventually, Kirino relies on their experience and strength to win the game! But there`s good news from the hospital--Sakamoto`s parents are in a stable condition.
Source: crunchyroll
